name: Employeet not dead
description:
Explore a fantastic world remotely inspired by modern issues and Franz Kafkas work (It is also a spiritual successor to Mail Not Sent) with a whopping 1 character with vague personality and clandestine motives. Several surreal stages. Random generation of a few things for an unique play through every time. A hard fast-paced action minigame. Truly artistic Cutscenes AND MORE! ALL IN THIS EXPERIMENTAL MASTERPIECE.

BEWARE: We take no responsibility for any photosensitive users triggered by content in the game, you've been warned although there shouldn't be anything too bad. ALSO This game is only for TRULY artistic individuals, I don't wanna hear any complaints about the game being hard or unfun or anything, it's art. (Bug reports welcome if the bug is not intentional (we call that a feature))

This sublime artistic masterpiece was created in collaboration with several great artists of modern times:

IQuick 143 - Audio Engineer, Programming God, Visionare, Playtester

Slangens - Good friend, epic clarinet player, Playtester

Eyyyyyy - Stunning Visual Artist

Rouli - Another talented artist

Freesound.org - not a person but a good resource

Unity Asset store - E P I C
